Brown Marketplace

An online transaction platform for Brown University students and faculty members who are looking to sell or buy second-hand belongings within the Providence area.

Brown Marketplace

App Concept: Orca

A mockup for Orca, an online financial hub for Gen Z. It includes the following features: spending money instantly, splitting bills with groups, access to local perks and discounts, and surfacing personal finance data.

App Concept: Orca
